emberutils.progress_smithing: Smith %s has finished %d/%d items, remaining time: %s
emberutils.settings.title: EmberUtils Config
emberutils.settings.durabilityDisplayFix: Show durability on not damageable item in vanilla.
emberutils.settings.mmoItemNameFix.descr: Fixes item name carrying tooltip background in chat or above hotbar.
emberutils.settings.centeredItemNameBack: Center the MMOItems name background on the tooltip above hotbar. Will override MMOItem name fix.
emberutils.settings.prettierItemName.des: Fixes MMOItems that has previously took out from an anvil which will lose name background.
emberutils.settings.keepChat.description: Keeps chat even if switched server or disconnected. You can still clear chat with F3+D.
Notifies in chat when a factory product is complete.
emberutils.settings.smithingNotification: Notifies in chat when a smithing item is complete.
emberutils.settings.uraniumHud.descripti: Adds an eye-catching hud to the screen, reminds you to not forget about uranium.
